original_text: (That was the kingdom of King Og in Bashan, who ruled in Ashtaroth and Edrei. He was one of the last of the Rephaites.) Moses had won a fight against them and he had taken their land.
korean_text: 곧 르바의 남은 족속으로서 아스다롯과 에드레이에서 다스리던 바산 왕 옥의 온 나라라 모세가 이 땅의 사람들을 쳐서 쫓아냈어도

sentences.original_text: That was the kingdom of King Og in Bashan
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 바산에 있는 오그 왕의 왕국이었다

sentences.original_text: who ruled in Ashtaroth and Edrei
He was one of the last of the Rephaites
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 르바인 중 마지막 중 한 사람이었다

sentences.original_text: Moses had won a fight against them
and he had taken their land
